post.text: Tomorrow, we have the chance to stand up for the America we believe in. Share this if you're voting. hillaryclinton.com/makeaplan

comment.author: Dominic
comment.text: Texas will always be a republican state, with all the close minded people that live here. Its the last state to want anything GOOD and NEW. I SUPPORT YOU HILLARY 100% and i try educate anyone that will listen, as to why they should vote for you.

replies.author: Ashley
replies.text: It's very unfortunate that Texas will always be red. People in Texas are good people but when it comes to politics, they are very uninformed on the real issues.
